# Portfolio Website Development Instructions

This is a modern Next.js TypeScript portfolio website featuring:
- Next.js 14 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- shadcn/ui component library
- GSAP for animations
- Responsive design
- Modern UI/UX patterns

## Developer Profile
- Fullstack developer (frontend focused)
- Languages: JavaScript, React, TypeScript, Next.js, Python, C/C++, Rust (intermediate)
- Infrastructure: Docker
- Networking: CCNA certified
- Security: Pentesting (intermediate)
- Education: Business and IT graduate

## Project Structure
- Components organized by feature
- TypeScript for type safety
- Modern CSS with Tailwind
- Animated interactions with GSAP
- Responsive and accessible design
